title: October 9, 2019: Zilliqa (ZIL): Down 1.21%
text:
How Did Zilliqa’s Price Fare Yesterday?

Zilliqa’s current price, at the time of this writing, is $0.006129 USD, down by approximately 1.21% from the day prior. Yesterday’s down day is a reversal of the day before it; in terms of trend, though, note that the current price is now 7.35% above its 20 day moving average, and is currently in an up trend over the past 14 days. In terms of an expected trading range, the Bollinger bands on Zilliqa suggest price may bounce between $0.00484 and $0.006579 based on its momentum and volatility over the past 14 days. Price’s current proximity to the top of the range may make shorting an attractive opportunity to traders interested in trading the range.

Trade Zilliqa (ZIL) and over 500 other cryptos across ten different exchanges — all from one app. Try Quadency.

As for Zilliqa’s market cap, it is currently at about $55M US dollars.

Straight Off the Chain

24 transactions amongst holders of Zilliqa occurred yesterday. As for the number of holders, yesterday saw the number of wallets holding Zilliqa increase by 6. Our engagement rank, which combines weekly percentage growth in number of holders and number of transfers, has Zilliqa ranked 31 out of the 32 Ethereum tokens we’re tracking.

Just How Rich are Zilliqa’s Richest Holders?

The top 1,000 Zilliqa wallets hold over 98.28% of the token’s total money supply. Drilling down to just exchanges, the top 1,000 wallets that are exchanges control 9.85% of the currency’s money supply. In terms of growth rates, the share of total supply of the richest 1,000 wallets has grown by 0% over the past week. For the exchange wallets within the richest 1,000 wallets, their share has grown by 0.11%.

Technical Development Status

The last activity date on Zilliqa’s GitHub repository was October 08, 2019, or about 1 days ago. Growth rates for open issues — a “”to-do list”” of sorts and watchers (“”subscribers”” following a code repository) for Zilliqa are growing by 0.43 and 0.63, respectively, over the past 30 days.

What’s Going on Social Media?

Twitter appears to be the most popular place to follow the company, and thus may be worth monitoring. Use this link to follow Zilliqa on Twitter.

Where to Buy

You can trade Zilliqa, listed under the symbol ZIL, through the following exchanges: Gate, Yobit, Binance, DDEX, Ethfinex.

Article by SixJupiter
